# bunyan-wrapper
A wrapper around the (bunyan)[https://github.com/trentm/node-bunyan] logger

### Using the CLI to view logs on a node
From the app root directory run `./node_modules/.bin/bunyan logs/business-manager.log`
``` bash
[root@aws-dev-node-business-manager-01 ~]$ cd /opt/abc/business-manager/
[root@aws-dev-node-business-manager-01 /opt/abc/business-manager]$ ll
total 196
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root       10 Jan  2 21:17 BUILD_VERSION
drwxr-xr-x.   2 abcapp abcapp     33 Jan  2 21:20 logs
drwxr-xr-x. 285 abcapp root     8192 Jan  2 21:17 node_modules
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root     2349 Jan  2 21:16 package.json
drwxr-xr-x.   2 abcapp root       48 Jan  2 21:17 public
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root     2145 Jan  2 21:16 README.md
drwxr-xr-x.   3 abcapp root       61 Jan  2 21:16 server
drwxr-xr-x.   3 abcapp root       16 Jan  2 21:16 web
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root     1714 Jan  2 21:16 webpack.config.js
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root      792 Jan  2 21:16 webpack.dev.config.js
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root      981 Jan  2 21:16 webpack.prod.config.js
-rw-r--r--.   1 abcapp root   159751 Jan  2 21:16 yarn.lock
[root@aws-dev-node-business-manager-01 /opt/abc/business-manager]$ ./node_modules/.bin/bunyan logs/business-manager.log
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.887Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01: ----------------------------------------------
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.890Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01: App accessable at: 127.0.0.1:8080
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.890Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01: Runtime environment: production
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.890Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01: ----------------------------------------------
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.890Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01:
[2017-01-02T21:20:25.944Z]  INFO: business-manager/11907 on aws-dev-node-business-manager-01: registered with eureka:  business-manager/aws-dev-node-business-manager-01 (module=eureka-client)

```
